hits.definition:
压 (F 壓)

[yā] press, pressure

[yà] 压根 yàgēn from the start, in the first place, altogether, entirely, totally, at all, simply

占

[zhān] fortune telling

[zhàn] occupy; 占领 zhànlǐng capture

均

[jūn] even; 平均 píngjūn average

烈

[liè] (= 强烈 qiángliè) intense; 热烈 ardent; 烈士 martyr

奖 (F 獎)

[jiǎng] prize, award; 奖金 bonus; 奖学金 scholarship

婆

[pó] old lady; 老婆 lǎopo wife

赶 (F 趕)

[gǎn] catch up

富

[fù] (= 富有 fùyǒu) rich; 丰富 fēngfù abundant; 财富 cáifù wealth

兰 (F 蘭)

[lán] 兰花 lánhuā orchid

录 (F 錄)

[lù] record; 记录 jìlù take notes; 录音机 tape recorder

画 (F 畫)

[huà] draw, picture

遇

[yù] meet; 遇到 yùdào encounter

顿 (F 頓)

[dùn] to pause, meal

艺 (F 藝)

[yì] skill, (= 艺术 yìshù) art; 文艺 wényì literature and art

普

[pǔ] 普通 pǔtōng common; 普通话 Pǔtōnghuà Common Speach = Mandarin; 普遍 pǔbiàn universal

判

[pàn] judge; 批判 pīpàn criticize

源

[yuán] (=来源 láiyuán) source, origin; 资源 zīyuán resources

亿 (F 億)

[yì] 100 million

素

[sù] plain, white, vegetarian; 因素 yīnsù factor, element
